title: Potion of agility
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Potion                                                                                      |
| :--- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Potion of agility                                                                           |
| Icon | [![Potion of agility.png](/images/4/4b/Potion_of_agility.png)](/File:Potion_of_agility.png) |

|   |                                                                                                |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A magic potion which greatly increases the dexterity and evasiveness of the one who drinks it. |

Quaffing a **potion of agility** provides you with the following temporary bonuses:

- +50 [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth")
- +5 [evasion](/Evasion "Evasion")
- +5 [dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity") (This added DEX further increases your stealth and evasion by an amount based on your [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging") and [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") skills)

These effects last 35 to 74 [turns](/Turn "Turn"). Drinking the potion when already agile will increase the duration, but never to over 80 turns.

Although the benefits of a potion of agility are less dramatic than those of a [potion of might](/Potion_of_might "Potion of might"), the added evasion can prove useful in combat against monsters with powerful physical attacks, and extra stealth is always welcome to stabbers, making it a fairly useful combat buff in the early- and mid-game.

## History

- In [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), potions of agility were replaced by [potions of stabbing](/Potions_of_stabbing "Potions of stabbing").

| [Potions](/Potion "Potion")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

| [Ambrosia](/Potion_of_ambrosia "Potion of ambrosia") • [Attraction](/Potion_of_attraction "Potion of attraction") • [Berserk rage](/Potion_of_berserk_rage "Potion of berserk rage") • [Brilliance](/Potion_of_brilliance "Potion of brilliance") • [Cancellation](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") • [Curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing") • [Degeneration](/Potion_of_degeneration "Potion of degeneration") • [Enlightenment](/Potion_of_enlightenment "Potion of enlightenment") • [Experience](/Potion_of_experience "Potion of experience") • [Haste](/Potion_of_haste "Potion of haste") • [Heal wounds](/Potion_of_heal_wounds "Potion of heal wounds") • [Invisibility](/Potion_of_invisibility "Potion of invisibility") • [Lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") • [Magic](/Potion_of_magic "Potion of magic") • [Might](/Potion_of_might "Potion of might") • [Mutation](/Potion_of_mutation "Potion of mutation") • [Resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") |

Potion of agility

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Potion
Name Potion of agility
Icon
A magic potion which greatly increases the dexterity and evasiveness of the one who drinks it.

Quaffing a potion of agility provides you with the following temporary bonuses:

  • +50 stealth
  • +5 evasion
  • +5 dexterity (This added DEX further increases your stealth and evasion by an amount based on your Dodging and Stealth skills)

These effects last 35 to 74 turns. Drinking the potion when already agile will increase the duration, but never to over 80 turns.

Although the benefits of a potion of agility are less dramatic than those of a potion of might, the added evasion can prove useful in combat against monsters with powerful physical attacks, and extra stealth is always welcome to stabbers, making it a fairly useful combat buff in the early- and mid-game.

History

  • In 0.25, potions of agility were replaced by potions of stabbing.
